format: A data frame with 1070 observations on the following 18 variables.
reference:
Stine, Robert A., Foster, Dean P., Waterman, Richard P. Business
Analysis Using Regression (1998). Published by Springer.
title: Orange Juice Data
description:
Description
The data contains 1070 purchases where the customer either
purchased Citrus Hill or Minute Maid Orange Juice. A number of
characteristics of the customer and product are recorded.

parameters.ListPriceDiff: List price of MM less list price of CH
parameters.Store7:
A factor with levels No and Yes
indicating whether the sale is at Store 7
parameters.STORE: Which of 5 possible stores the sale occured at
parameters.Purchase:
A factor with levels CH and MM
indicating whether the customer purchased Citrus Hill or Minute
Maid Orange Juice
parameters.PriceDiff: Sale price of MM less sale price of CH
